songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad

[Verse 1]
I am so bad, they call me the terrorist
There's many haters that I call the narrowest
You wanna take a risk, find me and I'll tie your wrist
You wanna get me pissed, you'll end up on my wishlist
I try, I try, I try to be good, yeah I try
I try, I try, I try to be good, yeah I try

[Chorus]
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad

[Verse 2]
Shibi-dibi-dee, dibi-dibi-dee-dee
Who is in the tree? He trying to shoot me
Shibi-dibi-dee, dibi-dibi-dee-dee
Who is in the sea? He trying to shoot me
Like a Somalian yeah I’m in the sea
I get all of your guns before you get me
Go to the army, trying to find me
But that ain’t going to happen 'cause you can’t track me
I’m bad, I'm better, I'm even more fed up
With nothing to lose but my bootleg sweater
You can call the government and call me terror
But I say your trick is to get more cheddar

[Chorus]
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad

[Bridge]
I try, I try, try to be good, yeah I try
I try, I try, try to be good, yeah I try
I try, I try, try to be good, yeah I try
I try, I try, try to be good, yeah I try

[Verse 3]
You're fucked and corrupt, and you know I'm just bad
You say "give peace a chance", I save peace a seat for chance
You punks play pranks cause your campaign works on grants
That's why I make them bounce and hide out in the south of France

[Chorus]
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad

[Outro]
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
I'm ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba-ba, I'm bad
songs.title: I’m Bad
